document_data.name: Thaulindra
document_data.mainbody: '''Lady Thaulindra''' was a noblewoman of the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She had been the possessor of the ''[[Tiara of the Eyes]]''.
document_data.Possessions: She was the bearer of the ''[[Tiara of the Eyes]]'' until the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: [[Hlael Toraunt]], while scrying on the caravan transporting [[Shandril Shessair]] in late {{yearlink|1357}}, commented that [[Krostal]], a thief working for the [[Cult of the Dragon]], had stolen the ''Tiara of the Eyes'' off of Lady Thaulindra's head some years prior in [[Sheirtalar]], right under the noses of the [[Zhentarim]].
